metadata.title: CVE-2022-41999 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the DDS native tile readingfunctionality of OpenImageIO Project OpenImageIO v2.3.19.0 and v2.4.4.2. Aspecially-crafted .dds can lead to denial of service. An attacker canprovide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
